arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Brighton: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: The Cherries have got off to another positive start this season, currently sitting in 7th with six points, having most recently defeated Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur . Meanwhile, Adam Webster is a long-term absence for the Seagulls, also recovering from a knee injury.

arts.ttl: Brighton XI vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton travel to the south coast for their clash with Bournemouth full of confidence after a superb comeback victory against Manchester City. That result provided the perfect springboard as they head into the rest of the season. However, the Seagulls are still searching for their first away win of the campaign. arts.sum: Bournemouth return to the Vitality Stadium with renewed purpose after an impressive start to the season. arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Brighton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Bournemouth and Brighton meet in a south coast clash on Saturday, with both sides entering the match buoyed by significant victories before the international break. The Cherries secured an impressive away win at Tottenham, while the Seagulls came from behind to stun Manchester City. However, recent history favours the visitors.
